short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow users a true Click to Call. Email contact@n-sip.com to enable your site with Click To Call

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
N-SIP LTD developed VoIP plugin/extension/app; our costumers are companies with on-line presence.
Why is it good for users? Let's say one is looking for an hotel. He will probably Google for it. Once he is at that hotel's site he is held back from calling since 1-800 numbers do not work for over sea calls. If that hotel is N-SIP's costumer the user will see a green tube on the hotel's site, inviting to just Click-To-Call - for free.
